boardgame.name: Galactic Emperor
boardgame.description: Galactic Emperor is a fast paced empire-building game of exploration, conflict, and struggle for dominance. The last Galactic Emperor has met with a sudden and quite fatal accident. Now there is a power vacuum in the galaxy, and you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re one of the Planetary Dukes who wants to fill it. Each player controls a space sector with a home planet, and for a time, shares the power of the galactic throne. During the fight for control, the central Omega Sun is heading toward collapse_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; a cataclysm that will only accelerate the chaos!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game plays over several rounds, and within each round, the roles players choose determine what happens next. There are 7 different types of roles: Explorer, Steward, Merchant, Engineer, Warlord, Regent, and Scientist. All players get a turn to act during each role. Players discover planets, gain resources, build ships, and attack space fleets in a desperate effort to grind foes into cosmic dust!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins, becoming the ultimate Galactic Emperor!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Designer:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Adam West_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Board and rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Full Color Galaxy Board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Rule Booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ships (74 plastic ships)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;48 Small sized Fighters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;24 Medium sized Cruisers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;12 Huge sized Dreadnoughts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Resource Cubes (94 wooden cubes)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;40 Food Resource Cubes (green)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;36 Metal Resource Cubes (blue)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;18 Energy Resource Cubes (yellow)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hexagon Tiles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;38 Sector Tiles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6 Home Starbase Tokens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;66 Colorful Empire Tokens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;66 Victory Chits (value 1, 3, 5 - dark blue)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;70 Galactic Marks Chits (value 1, 5 - silver _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; CrossCut Games (XCG 9001) Galactic Emperor is a fast paced empire-building board game of exploration, conflict and struggle for dominance. The last Galactic Emperor has met with a sudden and quite fatal accident. Now there is a power vacuum in the galaxy, and you’re one of the Planetary Dukes who wants to fill it. Each player controls a space sector with a home planet, and for a time, shares the power of the galactic throne. During the fight for control, the central Omega Sun is heading toward collapse... a cataclysm that will only accelerate the chaos! The game plays over several rounds, and within each round, the roles players choose determine what happens next. There are 7 different types of roles: Explorer, Steward, Merchant, Engineer, Warlord, Regent, and Scientist. All players get a turn to act during each role. Players discover planets, gain resources, build ships, and attack space fleets in a desperate effort to grind foes into cosmic dust! The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins, becoming the ultimate Galactic Emperor!

Sealed in shrinkwrap. $8 shipped in the US. Outside the US, please ask. I am happy to ship anywhere in the world you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re willing to pay for, BUT I can no longer guarantee shipping times. I have had trouble in the past with items taking a long time to reach their destination to another country, but I have never lost an item yet.
for user kdean1 only, please. Priority mail ship $10.35

This game is in excellent condition and has never been played. The pieces are still unpunched although the shrinkwrap has been removed from the box. CrossCut Games (XCG 9001) Galactic Emperor is a fast paced empire-building board game of exploration, conflict and struggle for dominance. The last Galactic Emperor has met with a sudden and quite fatal accident. Now there is a power vacuum in the galaxy, and you’re one of the Planetary Dukes who wants to fill it. Each player controls a space sector with a home planet, and for a time, shares the power of the galactic throne. During the fight for control, the central Omega Sun is heading toward collapse... a cataclysm that will only accelerate the chaos! The game plays over several rounds, and within each round, the roles players choose determine what happens next. There are 7 different types of roles: Explorer, Steward, Merchant, Engineer, Warlord, Regent, and Scientist. All players get a turn to act during each role. Players discover planets, gain resources, build ships, and attack space fleets in a desperate effort to grind foes into cosmic dust! The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins, becoming the ultimate Galactic Emperor!

Description: Galactic Emperor is a fast paced empire-building board game of exploration, conflict and struggle for dominance. The last Galactic Emperor has met with a sudden and quite fatal accident. Now there is a power vacuum in the galaxy, and you’re one of the Planetary Dukes who wants to fill it. Each player controls a space sector with a home planet, and for a time, shares the power of the galactic throne. During the fight for control, the central Omega Sun is heading toward collapse… a cataclysm that will only accelerate the chaos! The game plays over several rounds, and within each round, the roles players choose determine what happens next. There are 7 different types of roles: Explorer, Steward, Merchant, Engineer, Warlord, Regent, and Scientist. All players get a turn to act during each role. Players discover planets, gain resources, build ships, and attack space fleets in a desperate effort to grind foes into cosmic dust! The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins, becoming the ultimate Galactic Emperor! Components: 1 Full Color Galaxy Board 48 Sculpted Plastic Fighters 66 Victory Chits 24 Sculpted Plastic Crusiers 70 Galactic Marks 12 Huge Plastic Dreadnoughts 94 Wooden Resource Cubes 12 Technology Cards 38 Custome Sector Tiles 1 Direction Card 66 Colorful Empire Tokens 1 Throne Card 6 Home Starbase Tokens 6 Ship Reference Cards 7 Unique Role Cards 6 Storage Facility Cards ********************************** Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

Game: Galactic Emperor Condition: very good to like new Language: English Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking (if you choose a cheaper shipping option without tracking, you do so at your own risk!) Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact frank@spieleberatung.com and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com
